let.value: {SELECT CASE WHEN stEditItemAgentBItemNameRowId LIKE "%" || TOSTRING(rBIndex) || "%" THEN tbAgentBItemName.text WHEN rB.new_row = true AND rB.new_row_readonly = false THEN tbAgentBItemNameNewRow.text WHEN stEditItemAgentBItemNameRowId NOT LIKE "%" || TOSTRING(rBIndex) || "%" THEN tvAgentBItemName.text ELSE " " END}
{SELECT DITAA.stAgentAItemName FROM ltblDefaulItemTableAgentA DITAA WHERE DITAA.stAgentARowId = TOSTRING(rBIndex)}

{SELECT CASE WHEN stEditItemAgentBManufacturerItemNumberRowId LIKE "%" || TOSTRING(rBIndex) || "%" THEN tbAgentBManufacturerItemNumber.text WHEN rB.new_row = true AND rB.new_row_readonly = false THEN tbAgentBManufacturerItemNumberNewRow.text WHEN stEditItemAgentBManufacturerItemNumberRowId NOT LIKE "%" || TOSTRING(rBIndex) || "%" THEN tvAgentBManufacturerItemNumber.text ELSE " " END}
{SELECT DITAA.stAgentAManufacturerItemNumber FROM ltblDefaulItemTableAgentA DITAA WHERE DITAA.stAgentARowId = TOSTRING(rBIndex)}

{SELECT CASE WHEN stEditItemAgentBTaxNumberRowId LIKE "%" || TOSTRING(rBIndex) || "%" THEN tbAgentBTaxNumber.text WHEN rB.new_row = true AND rB.new_row_readonly = false THEN tbAgentBTaxNumberNewRow.text WHEN stEditItemAgentBTaxNumberRowId NOT LIKE "%" || TOSTRING(rBIndex) || "%" THEN tvAgentBTaxNumber.text ELSE " " END}
{SELECT DITAA.stAgentATaxNumber FROM ltblDefaulItemTableAgentA DITAA WHERE DITAA.stAgentARowId = TOSTRING(rBIndex)}

{SELECT CASE WHEN stEditItemAgentBAmountRowId LIKE "%" || TOSTRING(rBIndex) || "%" THEN tbAgentBAmount.text WHEN rB.new_row = true AND rB.new_row_readonly = false THEN tbAgentBAmountNewRow.text WHEN stEditItemAgentBAmountRowId NOT LIKE "%" || TOSTRING(rBIndex) || "%" THEN tvAgentBAmount.text ELSE " " END}
{SELECT DITAA.stAgentAAmount FROM ltblDefaulItemTableAgentA DITAA WHERE DITAA.stAgentARowId = TOSTRING(rBIndex)}

{SELECT CASE WHEN stEditItemAgentBUnitRowId LIKE "%" || TOSTRING(rBIndex) || "%" THEN tbAgentBUnit.text WHEN rB.new_row = true AND rB.new_row_readonly = false THEN tbAgentBUnitNewRow.text WHEN stEditItemAgentBUnitRowId NOT LIKE "%" || TOSTRING(rBIndex) || "%" THEN tvAgentBUnit.text ELSE " " END}
{SELECT DITAA.stAgentAUnit FROM ltblDefaulItemTableAgentA DITAA WHERE DITAA.stAgentARowId = TOSTRING(rBIndex)}

{SELECT CASE WHEN stEditItemAgentBGrossWeightRowId LIKE "%" || TOSTRING(rBIndex) || "%" THEN tbAgentBGrossWeight.text WHEN rB.new_row = true AND rB.new_row_readonly = false THEN tbAgentBGrossWeightNewRow.text WHEN stEditItemAgentBGrossWeightRowId NOT LIKE "%" || TOSTRING(rBIndex) || "%" THEN tvAgentBGrossWeight.text ELSE " " END}
{SELECT DITAA.stAgentAGrossWeight FROM ltblDefaulItemTableAgentA DITAA WHERE DITAA.stAgentARowId = TOSTRING(rBIndex)}
{SELECT DITAA.stAgentANewRow FROM ltblDefaulItemTableAgentA DITAA WHERE DITAA.stAgentARowId = TOSTRING(rBIndex)}
{SELECT DITAA.stAgentANewRowReadonly FROM ltblDefaulItemTableAgentA DITAA WHERE DITAA.stAgentARowId = TOSTRING(rBIndex)}

{CASE WHEN (stAgentBItemName = stAgentAItemName AND (rB.new_row = false AND stAgentANewRow = false)) OR ((rB.new_row = true AND stAgentANewRow = true)AND(rB.new_row_readonly != false OR stAgentANewRowReadonly != false)) OR ((rB.new_row = true AND stAgentANewRow = true)AND(rB.new_row_readonly = false AND stAgentANewRowReadonly = false)AND(stAgentBItemName = stAgentAItemName)) THEN true ELSE false END}

{CASE WHEN (stAgentBManufacturerItemNumber = stAgentAManufacturerItemNumber AND (rB.new_row = false AND stAgentANewRow = false)) OR ((rB.new_row = true AND stAgentANewRow = true)AND(rB.new_row_readonly != false OR stAgentANewRowReadonly != false)) OR ((rB.new_row = true AND stAgentANewRow = true)AND(rB.new_row_readonly = false AND stAgentANewRowReadonly = false)AND(stAgentBManufacturerItemNumber = stAgentAManufacturerItemNumber)) THEN true ELSE false END}
